article.headline: Tesla shares slide in premarket trade, dragging Nasdaq 100 futures lower
article.body: Tesla TSLA, +1.89% shares slumped nearly 10% in premarket trade on Tuesday, afterS&P Dow Jones Indices declined to add the electric vehicle maker to the S&P 500 stock market index. There was no explanation for the omission. Tesla is a component of the Nasdaq 100 NDX, +1.51%, and the Nasdaq 100 futures contract NQ00, +1.63% slumped over 2%.
